explains: n. 现象；杰出的人，非凡的人（或事物）；（哲学）现象
wordGroup: social phenomenon 社会现象；群集现象
el nino phenomenon 厄尔尼诺现象
rebound phenomenon 回缩现象；回跳现象

sentences.en: This phenomenon piqued Dr. Morris' interest.
sentences.cn: 该现象引起莫里思博士的兴趣。

sentences.en: Globalization is a phenomenon of the 21st century.
The causes of the phenomenon are still incompletely understood.
sentences.cn: 造成这种现象的原因尚未彻底弄清。
